Race.SpecificTitle: PW Sr. Citizens Tax Cont. -- 1.06 Mills - PJ - 10 Yrs.
Race.FullText: Shall the Parish of Rapides, State of Louisiana, continue to levy and collect a special ad valorem tax of one and six-hundredths (1.06) mills on each dollar of assessed valuation on all the property subject to taxation in said Parish (an estimated $170,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2017 and ending with the year 2026, for the purpose of providing funds to match Federal and State funds allocated to Rapides Parish for services to the elderly, including the establishment and maintenance of centers for senior citizens, a work of public improvement for the parish, said millage to represent a three hundredths of a mill (.03) increase over the 1.03 mills tax authorized to be levied through the year 2016 pursuant to an election held on July 16, 2005?

Race.SpecificTitle: Road District No. 3-A Maintenance -- 32 Mills - PJ - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Road District No. 3-A Maintenance Proposition
(Tax Continuation)
Race.FullText: Shall Road District No. 3-A Maintenance of the Parish of Rapides, State of Louisiana (the "District"), continue to levy and collect a tax of thirty-two (32.00) mills on all the property subject to taxation in the District (an estimated $1,120,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2017 and ending with the year 2026, for the purpose of constructing, maintaining, and keeping in repair the public roads, highways, and bridges within said District, said millage to represent a three and eighty-one hundredths (3.81) mill increase over the 28.91 mills tax authorized to be levied through the year 2016 pursuant to an election held on July 16, 2005?

Race.SpecificTitle: Fire Protection District No. 10 -- 22.59 Mills - PJ - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Fire Protection District No. 10 Proposition
(Tax Continuation)
Race.FullText: Shall Fire Protection District No. 10 of the Parish of Rapides, continue to levy and collect a special ad valorem tax of twenty-two and fifty-nine hundredths (22.59) mills on each dollar of assessed valuation on all the property subject to taxation in said District (an estimated $160,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2017 and ending with the year 2026, for the purpose of constructing, operating and maintaining fire protection facilities and paying the costs of obtaining water for fire protection purposes within said District, said millage to represent a one and eighty-five hundredths (1.85) mills increase over the 20.74 mills tax authorized to be levied through the year 2016 pursuant to an election held on July 16, 2005?

Race.SpecificTitle: Buckeye Recreation District -- 6.09 Mills - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.FullText: Shall the Buckeye Recreation District of the Parish of Rapides, State of Louisiana, continue to levy and collect a special ad valorem tax of six and nine hundredths (6.09) mills on each dollar of assessed valuation on all the property subject to taxation within the confines of said District (an estimated $73,891 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), said tax to constitute a continuation of a similar tax, the tax for which the levy expires on the 2016 tax rolls, for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2017 and ending with the year 2026, for the purpose of constructing, maintaining and operating the recreational facilities of said District, said millage to represent a nineteen hundredths mills (.19) increase over the 5.90 mills tax authorized to be levied through the year 2016 pursuant to an election held on July 15, 2006?
